detectors.description:
PoolRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VBTC.sol#994-1011) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(REWARD_DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VBTC.sol#998)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VBTC.sol#1001)
